speaker: Dark Mage
lines: You find the dark mage far from the academy.
He sees you, snaps a spell, and pulls you into his lair.
He is tall and thin, with a white beard and pointed hat.
He sits in a stone chair and studies you.
'Why have you come looking for me?' he asks.

choices.text: You ask the dark mage to teach you his spells

give_item.name: Poison Plague
give_item.description: A spell infesting the target with a deadly plague

choices.text: You decide to fight the dark mage.
You decide to leave the dark mage's lair.
